trans-unit.source:
Dear %firstNameHR%,

Your application for the position: %jobTitle%" with the status "%applicationStatus%" is still under review. Our recruiters will contact you, if more information is required.

Best Regards,
Your Transport Talent Team
trans-unit.target:
Kære %firstNameHR% %lastNameHR%,

din ansøgning til stilling: "%jobTitle%" med status "%applicationStatus%" er stadig i ansøgningsprocess.

Venlig Hilsen,

Matchico teamet
